title: Linn County
marks:
Number 
in pencil, on back, URC: [15]
description: clockwise from LLC:  five men; three figures in white robes standing and seated near a tentlike structure; two women wearing stockings and underclothes; man wearing a diaper and a helmet, holding a machine gun; woman in billowing dress; man in clergyman\'s coat and hat, standing behind a woman in white, wearing a bonnet and holding an American flag
